content.json: >**NOTE:** This workbook uses a parser based on a Kusto Function to normalize fields. [Follow these steps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/master/Parsers/ProofpointPOD/ProofpointPOD) to create the Kusto function alias **ProofpointPOD**.

content.query:
ProofpointPOD
| make-series TotalEvents = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by EventType;
content.title: Events over time
Email Messages over time

content.query:
ProofpointPOD
| where EventType == "message"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where isnotempty(FilterQuarantineRule)
| summarize Count = dcount(MsgNormalizedHeaderMessageId) by FilterQuarantineRule
content.title: Quarantine Rules Hits

content.query:
ProofpointPOD
| where EventType == "message"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where isnotempty(FilterModulesDmarcFilterdResult)
| summarize Count = dcount(MsgNormalizedHeaderMessageId) by FilterModulesDmarcFilterdResult
content.title: DMARC Summary Results

content.query:
ProofpointPOD
| where EventType == "message"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where isnotempty(FilterModulesSpamTriggeredClassifier)
| summarize Count = dcount(MsgNormalizedHeaderMessageId) by FilterModulesSpamTriggeredClassifier
content.title: Top AntiSpam Results

content.query:
ProofpointPOD
| where EventType == "message"
| where FilterDisposition == "discard" or FilterDisposition == "reject" or isnotempty(FilterQuarantineFolder)
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| extend dstUserUpn = todynamic(DstUserUpn) 
| mv-expand dstUserUpn
| summarize Count = dcount(MsgNormalizedHeaderMessageId) by tostring(dstUserUpn) | top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Recipients with high block rate

content.query:
ProofpointPOD
| where EventType == "message"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| extend srcUserUpn = todynamic(SrcUserUpn) 
| mv-expand srcUserUpn
| where isnotempty(srcUserUpn)
| summarize Count = dcount(MsgNormalizedHeaderMessageId) by tostring(srcUserUpn) | top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Senders

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.query:
ProofpointPOD
| where EventType == "message"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange1} 
| project NetworkDirection | distinct NetworkDirection | where isnotempty(NetworkDirection)
| order by NetworkDirection asc

content.query:
ProofpointPOD
| where EventType == "message"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange1}
| project-rename Direction = NetworkDirection, Sender = MsgHeaderFrom,  Recipient = MsgHeaderTo, Subject = MsgHeaderSubject, Filter_Action = FilterDisposition
| project TimeGenerated, Direction, Sender, Recipient, Subject, Filter_Action, MsgNormalizedHeaderMessageId
| search Sender contains "{Sender:value}" and Recipient contains "{Recipient:value}" and Subject contains "{Subject:value}"
| search Direction == "{Direction:value}" | project TimeGenerated, Direction, Sender, Recipient, Subject, Filter_Action, MsgNormalizedHeaderMessageId | take 50

content.title: TLS Usage over time
TLS Statistics

content.query:
ProofpointPOD
| where EventType == "message"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where FilterIsMsgEncrypted == "false"
| summarize Count=dcount(MsgNormalizedHeaderMessageId) by MsgHeaderFrom | top 10 by Count | extend Domain = extract("(.*@)([a-zA-z0-9.-]*)", 2, MsgHeaderFrom)
| project Domain, Count
content.title: Top 10 Sender domains not using TLS

content.query:
ProofpointPOD
| where EventType == "message"
| where FilterIsMsgEncrypted == "false"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| extend splited=split(MsgHeaderTo,",") | mv-expand splited | extend Domain = extract("(.*@)([a-zA-z0-9.-]*)", 2, tostring(splited))
| where isnotempty(Domain)
| summarize Count=dcount(MsgNormalizedHeaderMessageId) by Domain | top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Recipient domains not using TLS
